name: Anti-Terrorism! Shoot Sniper
description:
Anti-Terrorism! Shoot Sniper is a shooting game with the theme of anti-terrorism. It is full of action, shooting and war. Terrorists make terrorist attacks in the city. Your country is waiting for the hero to appear. You are an elite soldier, you have excellent shooting ability. Now is the time when you show your strength. Pick up your weapons, go to the battlefield, destroy all the terrorists. Save the innocent people.
Features:
- First Person Sniper Game
- Challenging missions
- a lot of advanced weapons
- Real sniper experience
- realistic battlefield environment
- High quality music and sound effects
- play anytime, anywhere
